content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2f35e634-3852-4cbf-b00a-6d4f534fe053/image2018-9-13_14-49-9.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":785,\"height\":451}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are welcome to explore the variety of EPAM applications and tools that help us deliver, grow, and connect with our teammates. Here is a list of tools we encourage you to explore within the next few months. We plan to reach out with additional communications about the timeline of your transition to the EPAM key reporting tools.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Global Menu\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Menu is a quick search of EPAM's internal systems. Global Menu connects all applications in the EPAM ecosystem and helps users find projects, employees, or applications. You do not need to go back and forth between a many different sites or figure out where to find the information you need: Global Menu lets you find what you need in one place in just seconds.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
